<style>


div.photo 
{
  margin:40px 100px 40px 100px;
  border: 1px solid #ccc;
  padding: 45px;
  float: center;
  width: 500px;
  height: auto;
  border-radius: 15px;
  background-color: white ;
}

div.photo:hover 
{
  border: 1px solid #777;
}

div.naming 
{
  margin:7px 10px 10px -5px;
  padding:10px 10px 10px 10px;
  text-align:left;
}

div.type 
{
  margin:-32px 10px 10px -27px;
  padding:10px 10px 10px 40px;
  text-align:left;
}

div.about 
{
  padding:35px 15px 0px 15px;
  text-align: center;
}

div.photo img
{
  width: 30%;
  height: auto;
  border-radius: 10px;
  float: right;
  margin:20px 1px 30px 20px;
}

.Caveat
{
	font-family: 'Caveat', cursive;
    font-size: 37px;
}

.Courgette
{
	font-family: 'Courgette', cursive;
    font-size: 17px;
}

.Cinzel
{
	font-family: 'Cinzel', cursive;
    font-size: 28px;
}

.Righteous
{
	font-family: 'Righteous', cursive;
    font-size: 22px;
}

.Pangolin
{
	font-family: 'Pangolin', cursive;
    font-size: 14px;
}

</style>
